title: Morgion (2008) - The Relapse Collection (V0) *American Doom*
description:
A remastered collection of their stuff released by Relapse Records. Contains the
Among Majestic Ruin and Solinari albums, the previously unreleased Oceans
Without Shores EP, and some demo / rehearsal tracks.

Disc 1
1. The Serpentine Scrolls/Descent to Arawn
2. Canticle
3. Solinari
4. Nightfall Infernal
5. All the Glory/All the Loss
6. Blight
7. The Last Sunrise
8. Mundane
9. Symphonie der Gravens
10. Canticle (Alernate Version)

Disc 2
1. Relic of a Darkened Past
2. In Ashen Tears (Thus I Cry)
3. Travesty
4. Basking under a Blacksun Dawning
5. Invalid Prodigy
6. Mundane (Demo)
7. The Serpentine Scrolls/Descent to Arawn (Demo)
8. Phoenix Moons (Demo)
9. All the Glory...All the Loss (Rehearsal Track)

EAC Lame 3.97 v0 VBR
